projects.title: Template Designer Application
projects.description: Interactive drag-and-drop template designer for custom email templates
projects.longDescription: Developed an interactive drag-and-drop template designer enabling users to create custom email templates. Built with modern React technologies and featuring real-time preview capabilities, component library, and seamless template export functionality.
features: Implemented dynamic HTML generation and export functionality for seamless template download
Built responsive UI components with real-time preview capabilities
Visual template builder with intuitive drag-and-drop interface
Component library for reusable email template elements
achievements: Seamless template creation and download experience
challenges: Creating a seamless user experience for template building

projects.title: Product Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Comprehensive analytics dashboard for product performance tracking
projects.longDescription: A powerful analytics dashboard that provides comprehensive insights into product performance, user behavior, and business metrics. Built with modern web technologies to deliver real-time data visualization and interactive reporting capabilities.
features: Interactive charts and graphs with D3.js
Export functionality for reports and data

projects.title: Video Catalog Application
projects.description: Modern video catalog app with advanced search and filtering
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive video catalog application that allows users to browse, search, and manage video collections. Features advanced filtering capabilities, responsive design, and intuitive user experience for video content management.

categories.name: Full Stack
categories.description: Complete web applications with frontend and backend
